text:
So they say you should do at least one thing
that scares you every day.

For me it is going to be riding the Ocean
Jet.

This is supposed to be like the roller coaster
of the sea but we're heading on it today.
After buckling up we began our Turbo Jet adventure.

This 880 horsepower vessel ripped through
the water like a speeding race car.

We headed out into the ocean and when our
skipper gave us the signal it indicated that
he was going to do a 360 degree power turn.

We ended up using all of our courage points
for the day with every sudden jolt.
It is a like a roller-coaster out on the sea.
It was a white knuckle adventure.

The best part was when they were doing the
360's.
